com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali

Class TouchViewHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali.TouchViewHandler

  • public class TouchViewHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class that adds top-down and third-person views in a VR setting, including handling of standard pan and zoom touch interactions.
